page.title: 19Recollection continued
page.content: Religion. in the one of the front gardens,and a short service was held,Each sunday school had its banner,and all then marched in procession round Newbridge singing hymns.After tea sports came with music and dancing and icecream. People used to be baptised in the River Ebbw near school. "MONKEY PARADE" After church all the boys would walk down to Abercarn and the girls would walk down often on the other side of the road.Later boys would ask to walk the girls home.The Old Bog (Where the comprehensive school's new sports field is) was used by boys for cricket.A stream ran down from the Pant(no housing estate then).Poor, elderly people used to build shacks by the stream.
